summary: A dedicated Electronics and Telecommunication professional with a strong background in machine learning, web development, and cloud platforms. Proven ability to lead projects, solve complex problems, and continuously learn new technologies to drive innovation and efficiency.

education.details: Specialized in ML, DBMS and Cloud Computing. Currently working on a project analyzing the socio-economic impact of pollution on life expectancy.

education.institution: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology
education.details: Graduated with First Class. Engaged in multiple projects focusing on web development, IoT and ML.

projects.title: TLDR - Web Page Summarizer Extension
description: - Developed a Chrome extension to summarize web pages.
- Utilized LLM to provide concise and clear summaries of web pages.
- Built a Flask backend to interface with LLM using OpenAI API.

projects.title: ASAPFiles
description: - WebSocket-based real-time file-sharing application.
- Implemented chunk-based file transmission for compatibility with large files.
- Built with Node.js, Express, and WebSocket (ws) for low-latency, bidirectional communication.

projects.title: Resume.AI - Resume Chatbot
description: - Using LLaMA LLM and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) along with prompt engineering.
- This chatbot serves as a dynamic extension of my professional story.
- Provides potential employers and collaborators quick, relevant insights into my capabilities.

projects.title: URL Shortener
description: - URL shortening service using Express.js to streamline long URLs into concise, shareable links.
- Integrated MongoDB for robust, scalable storage of URL mappings.
- Built an elegant front-end with Next.js to facilitate URL shortening.

projects.title: Professional Portfolio
description: - A sleek and modern webpage to showcase my skills and projects.
- Comprehensive showcase of my professional journey, featuring all my skills, expertise, and accomplishments in one place.
- Utilizing Redis as a primary database to store stats.
- Designed with Next.js and deployed using Vercel.

projects.title: Vishv
description: - Vishv, a comprehensive and informative website designed to spread awareness about the United Nations' 21 Sustainable Development Goals.
- Utilizing React for a dynamic and responsive frontend, paired with Django for a robust and scalable backend.
- Support for multiple languages and a color blindness-friendly interface, making it accessible to a diverse global audience.

projects.title: NatureNest
description: - A garden community app designed to track member activities, harvests, and plot details.

- Implemented using React for robust component-based architecture and Django for integration with a cloud SQL database, enabling real-time data retrieval and updates through a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: MongoDB-based Football Data Manager
description: - A basic football data CRUD application that allows for easy management of football-related information.

projects.title: Machine Learning Based Face Recognition Attendance System
description: - Designed and implemented a sophisticated Face Recognition Based Attendance System, incorporating DLIB, KNN, and data cleaning methodologies.
- Ensures precise identification through facial recognition and seamlessly captures and stores attendance data in CSV format.
- Provides an efficient and secure approach to attendance tracking.

projects.title: T.rex: Electronics Circuits Game
description: - A basic HTML/JS game intended to test the basic knowledge of the player regarding the basics of FET.
- During the teaching-learning process, it is paramount to know whether the student is learning what the teacher intends to.

- The game focuses on testing the students' knowledge about FET (Field Effect Transistor), named 'T.rex' to acknowledge the dinosaur character inspired by the Chrome offline game and the subject matter.

projects.title: Save Time - UX Design Project
description: - 'Save-Time' is a productivity app designed using FIGMA, featuring a sleek and user-friendly interface.
- The app's primary focus is to streamline and optimize time management.
- One of its key pages has been translated into a responsive HTML/CSS layout, with minimalistic yet engaging design elements.
- Basic JavaScript functionalities have been incorporated to enhance user interactivity.
